alert.note: Alert for Western Mineral (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 22 at 9:02PM EST until January 23 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 1 AM EST MONDAY... * WHAT...Freezing rain. Additional ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...In Maryland, Extreme Western Allegany County. In West Virginia, Western Mineral County. * WHEN...Until 1 AM EST Monday. * IMPACTS...Very slippery sidewalks, roads and bridges are possible.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. When venturing outside, watch your first few steps taken on steps, sidewalks, and driveways, which could be icy and slippery, increasing your risk of a fall and injury.
